Interface IInternshipRepository

All Known Implementing Classes:
InternshipRepository
public interface IInternshipRepository
Repository interface for Internship Opportunity data access operations. Follows Interface Segregation Principle and Dependency Inversion Principle.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    decrementSlot(String opportunityId)
    Decrement available slots for an opportunity (when application is approved) Also updates status to FILLED if slots reach 0
    int
    deleteExpiredOpportunities()
    Delete opportunities that have passed their closing date
    boolean
    deleteOpportunity(String opportunityId)
    Delete an internship opportunity by ID
    List<InternshipOpportunity>
    findAll()
    Find all internship opportunities
    Optional<InternshipOpportunity>
    findById(String internshipId)
    Find an internship opportunity by ID
    List<InternshipOpportunity>
    findByRepresentativeId(String repId)
    Find opportunities created by a specific company representative
    List<InternshipOpportunity>
    findByStatus(Status status)
    Find opportunities by status
    boolean
    incrementSlot(String opportunityId)
    Increment available slots for an opportunity (when withdrawal is approved) Also updates status from FILLED to SUCCESSFUL if slots become available
    boolean

    Save or update an internship opportunity

    Update opportunity status

    • decrementSlot

      boolean decrementSlot(String opportunityId)
      Decrement available slots for an opportunity (when application is approved) Also updates status to FILLED if slots reach 0

    • incrementSlot

      boolean incrementSlot(String opportunityId)
      Increment available slots for an opportunity (when withdrawal is approved) Also updates status from FILLED to SUCCESSFUL if slots become available

    • deleteExpiredOpportunities

      int deleteExpiredOpportunities()
      Delete opportunities that have passed their closing date
      Returns:
      number of opportunities deleted

    • deleteOpportunity

      boolean deleteOpportunity(String opportunityId)
      Delete an internship opportunity by ID
      Parameters:
      opportunityId - the ID of the opportunity to delete
      Returns:
      true if deleted successfully, false otherwise
